contents.text: Thank you for calling Appodeal, your Publishers First Ad Monetization partner in San Francisco.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an integration specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly guide me through integrating Appodeal’s SDK into my app.
Get step-by-step help adding the Appodeal SDK into my mobile game project
I need help integrating the Appodeal SDK into my Flutter app and debugging initialization errors.
I need someone to guide me through installing Appodeal’s SDK in my app.
I need assistance integrating your SDK into my university lab data acquisition app.

contents.text: For ad performance and optimization guidance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an optimization expert.

navigationGoals: Help me optimize ad performance and revenue with Appodeal.
Learn how to fine-tune ad placements and boost revenue in my app
I’m looking for advanced guidance on maximizing eCPM and fine-tuning my ad mediation waterfall.
I’d like advice on how to improve my app’s ad performance and earnings.
Can you advise on improving ad performance metrics for my physics learning app?

contents.text: For sales inquiries and pricing, press 2.
To set up a new account and learn about our plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Set up a new Appodeal account and walk me through your pricing plans.
Review pricing tiers and open a new Appodeal account for my app
I want to set up a new account, review pricing tiers, and compare enterprise plan features.
Can you help me open a new Appodeal account and explain the pricing plans?
I'd like to create a new account and review pricing options for my student-developed simulation app.

contents.text: For custom marketplace solutions and partnership opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with someone to discuss custom marketplace solutions and partnerships.
Explore custom marketplace integrations and partnership options for my veteran-focused app
I’m exploring a custom marketplace API integration and potential strategic partnership opportunities.
I’m interested in exploring a custom ad marketplace partnership with Appodeal.
I'm exploring custom marketplace partnerships to distribute my experimental measurement tool app.
